name: Checkboxes
short_description: Checkboxes that can be used for multi-select.

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the parameter.

properties2.name: label
properties2.description: (optional) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties3.name: option
properties3.description: (mandatory) set the options of this radio. Separate options with commas and use the pipe symbol to separate value from text.

properties5.name: description
properties5.example: Select the topping of your choice
properties5.description: (optional) (translatable) is text that will be shown as a tooltip when the user moves the mouse over the label.

properties6.name: required
properties6.description: (optional) The field must be filled before submitting the form.

properties7.name: class
properties7.description: (optional) is a CSS class name for the HTML form field. If omitted this will default to 'inputbox'.

properties8.name: showon
properties8.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The checkboxes form field type provides a set of checkboxes. Note: unlike most standard form field types, such as textfield or checkbox, this field is not an "out of the box" solution. It will create checkboxes for you, and submit their values in form of an array.
